tool_description: Validates return eligibility against store policies including returnable item categories, excluded products, and special conditions for different product types.

product_id.description: Product identifier to check return policy

product_category.description: Category of the product (electronics, clothing, books, etc.)

is_personalized.description: Whether the item was personalized or customized

error_messages: Invalid product: Product ID not found in catalog. Verify the product identifier.
Missing category: Product category is required for policy validation. Provide a valid category.
Invalid date format: Purchase date must be in ISO 8601 format. Use YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ format.
usage: Input product details and purchase information to check return policy compliance. Use after retrieving order information to validate return eligibility.

is_returnable.description: Whether the item is eligible for return according to policy

return_window_days.description: Number of days allowed for returns from purchase date

policy_notes.description: Special conditions or restrictions for this product type
